features: PERFECT FIRST RC EXPERIENCE - This toddler remote control cars has been specifically designed as a Perfect First RC vehicle for toddlers aged 2-4 years old who are exploring their curiosity about movement and independent play. Give your little speedster their first taste of the thrill of driving with this awesome race car toy!

DESIGNED FOR SAFETY - No worries, parents! This remote control car for toddlers is thoughtfully engineered to prioritize the safety of young children. With rounded edges and a sturdy build, it's crash-resistant and bump-proof! And the materials used are non-toxic and free from any harmful substances. Cars require 3 AA batteries (not included) and remote controls require 2 AA batteries (not included).

KID-FRIENDLY OPERATION - Our rc race cars for kids with detachable covers offer an intuitive control system that is easy to understand and operate, even for the little hands. The remote control features simple buttons that allow your child to effortlessly maneuver the car forward, backward with just a push of a button.

MULTIPLE WAYS TO PLAY: Apart from traditional remote control functions, this car toy also features LED lights and music. These additional sensory elements engage children's imagination and create an interactive playtime experience filled with sound and visual stimulation.

GREAT CHOICE FOR HOLIDAY GIFTS - Looking for an unforgettable gift for your favorite toddler? Look no further! This cute rc car will surely delight boys and girls alike during special occasions or holidays like birthdays or Christmas celebrations! Its eye-catching design, combined with its engaging features such as detachable covers, LED lights, music capability, makes it an impressive choice that will bring joy and excitement to any young child.

Product Details LED Lights for Added Excitement Equipped with LED lights, this RC race car toy illuminates the surroundings, adding an extra element of excitement and creating a visually stimulating experience for children. Pretty Durable Its sturdy construction ensures that it can withstand rough handling without being easily broken or damaged. Washable Car Shell With a detachable cover that's easy to remove and wash. No need to worry about any dirt or stains ruining the appearance of this toy.

User-Friendly Control With a user-friendly remote control, even young children can effortlessly maneuver and control this cute cartoon remote car. Cute Cartoon RC Car Toys The adorable design of the remote control car appeals to the young audience, sparking their imagination and creative play. Convenient Battery Operation Simply replace the batteries when needed, allowing for uninterrupted fun and playtime. Cars require 3 AA batteries (not included) and remote controls require 2 AA batteries (not included).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most fun
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a three year old but we all loved playing with it. Easy to use and durable. A win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Limited directional control, but still fun!
reviews.reviewText: When we first saw that you can only go two directions with the remote control I was worried it wouldn't be very functional, but our nephew LOVES it. And he figured out right away how to get it to go where he wanted even though the controls were limited. Of course batteries aren't included, and you need a screwdriver to open it up, but that's standard these days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun toddler toy that doesn't cause any damage
reviews.reviewText: Got the blue car, and it comes with a yellow remote control pad. It's the right size for toddler hands. The car has a pudgy, simple contour - perfect for banging into furniture without doing damage or losing parts. Wheels are sort of small- the car gets stuck occasionally on a low pile rug. Lastly, I wish you could turn off the music.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler LOVES this
reviews.reviewText: My two year old absolutely loves this remote controlled car. It's his first one he's ever used and the two buttons make it easy for your child to learn how to make the car go forward and backward. The music is a little repetitive though, it would have been nice to have something other than one song. But overall it's an inexpensive toy so for the amount of joy it's given him, it's worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute green car
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this car . The remote control is easy to use for a little one. The outer shell feels very durable. I like that it comes off because you can surface clean it that way. The little face is adorable and the lights make it fun at night too. It needs a lot of batteries but it's worth it. Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Such a cute car
reviews.reviewText: My little one loves this remote control car. It is great for babies. Easy for him to use, lights up, and makes sound. It is very soft and durable as he has driven it off the coffee table and it survived. Only thing I dislike is that it needs 5 AA batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a toddler.
reviews.reviewText: This will be for a child. Small, cute and will be fun to play with.
